get.description: Get list of system configurations including storage and image processing settings

post.description: Create a new system configuration (storage or image processing)

400.description: Invalid request or configuration test failed

post.description: Test a configuration without saving it (storage connection test)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific configuration

400.description: Invalid request or configuration test failed

delete.description: Delete a system configuration by ID

post.description: Set a configuration as the default for its category

400.description: Invalid config ID or storage provider not loaded

post.description: Disable a configuration without deleting it
Enable a previously disabled configuration

get.description: Get current image processing settings (thumbnail, WebP conversion, etc.)

put.description: Update image processing settings including thumbnail and WebP conversion options

get.description: Get list of all loaded storage providers

post.description: Hot reload a storage configuration (not supported in simplified mode)

get.description: Get paginated list of user's albums with image counts and cover URLs

post.description: Create a new album with name and optional description

get.description: Get detailed information about an album including all images

delete.description: Delete an album by ID (images in the album will not be deleted)

post.description: Add multiple images to an existing album

delete.description: Remove a single image from an album (image itself is not deleted)

post.description: Authenticate user with username and password, returns access token and sets refresh token cookie
Logout user by invalidating refresh token (requires refresh_token and device_id cookies)

401.description: Refresh token not found / invalid session

post.description: Refresh access token using refresh_token and device_id cookies

401.description: Refresh token or device ID not found / invalid

get.description: Get dashboard statistics including image count, storage usage, and recent activity

post.description: Force refresh the dashboard statistics cache

get.description: Check the health status of the application and its dependencies (database, cache, storage)

post.description: Delete multiple images by their identifiers in a single request

parameters.description: List of image identifiers to delete
parameters.name: request

post.description: Get paginated list of images with optional filters

get.description: Get a random image, optionally filtered by album and dimensions

parameters.description: Response format: json or image (default: image)
parameters.name: format

204.description: No content - no matching images found

post.description: Upload a single image file with optional storage strategy and visibility settings

parameters.description: Whether the image is public (default: true)
parameters.name: is_public

400.description: Invalid form data or too many files

post.description: Upload up to 10 images in a single batch request

400.description: Invalid form data or too many files

get.description: Retrieve an image by its unique identifier. Returns original or converted format based on Accept header

delete.description: Delete a single image by its identifier

get.description: Retrieve a thumbnail version of an image with specified width

put.description: Toggle image visibility between public and private

get.description: Get all API keys for the authenticated user with their status and metadata

post.description: Create a new API key for programmatic access

parameters.description: API key creation request (description is optional)
parameters.name: request

post.description: Temporarily disable an API key (can be re-enabled later)
Re-enable a previously disabled API key
Permanently revoke an API key (cannot be re-enabled)
